### Input data
```{r}
phenotype <- read.csv("../../Result/Phenotype/phenotype.csv", row.names = 1)
```


### Curation
```{r}
phenotype %>%  
    tbl_summary(
      by = study_condition,
      statistic = list(
       all_continuous() ~ "{mean} ({sd})",
       all_categorical() ~ "{n}/{N} ({p}%)")) %>%
    add_p(pvalue_fun=function(x){style_pvalue(x, digits = 3)}) %>%
    bold_labels() 
```
